item.description:
Please take a moment to read the ENTIRE update, as I have updated the new meetup dates/locations.
MEETUPS AT 1:00PM



Please note our next SUNDAY meetup will be held at Doggie Day @ 1PM as well as the BOSTON COMMON @ 11:00AM!

The spring season is here!!!Time to get those pups out and about! We will begin our indoor/outdoor season this month. I ask all members to please list which location you plan to attend in the comments section of your RSVP. This will help ensure that there's a "group" at each location. We don't want any lonely chihuahua roaming about. For those who are new to the group, all members can choose to attend one or both meetups (boston common , meets neat boylston T stop on the green @ 11AM) and/or Doggie Day play center at our usual time of 1:00pm.

Happy Mother's Day....chi moms and all



Indoor meetup will be held at Doggie day (1-3pm)


Should anyone have any questions, feel free to contact me.
Susana
item.name: The Boston Chihuahua June Meetup
